desc.en:
Fuzhou Metro is an urban rail transit system serving Fuzhou City, Fujian Province, China. Its first line was put into operation on May 18, 2016, making Fuzhou the 28th city in mainland China and the first city in Fujian Province to open rail transit.
As of August 2022, Fuzhou Metro has 4 lines in operation, including Fuzhou Metro Line 1, Fuzhou Metro Line 2, the first open section of Fuzhou Metro Line 5 and Fuzhou Metro Line 6, with a total operating mileage of 111 kilometers and 76 stations (Interchange station is calculated as one station).
As of August 2022, there are 5 lines under construction in Fuzhou Metro, including Fuzhou Metro Line 2 East Extension Phase I, Fuzhou Metro Line 4 Phase I, Fuzhou Metro Line 5 Rear Opening Section, Fuzhou Metro Line 6 East Transfer Section, and Fuzhou Metro Binhai Expressway, with a total length of 116 kilometers.
desc.zh-CN:
福州地铁（Fuzhou Metro）是服务于中国福建省福州市的城市轨道交通系统。其第一条线路于2016年5月18日开通初期运营，使福州成为中国内地第二十八座、福建省首座开通轨道交通的城市。
截至2022年8月，福州地铁运营线路共有4条，分别为福州地铁1号线、福州地铁2号线、福州地铁5号线首通段（荆溪厚屿站至螺洲古镇站）及福州地铁6号线，运营里程111千米，共设车站76座（换乘站按1座车站计） 。
截至2022年8月，福州地铁在建线路共有5条，分别为福州地铁2号线东延线一期、福州地铁4号线一期、福州地铁5号线后通段、福州地铁6号线东调段及福州地铁滨海快线，在建线路总长约116千米。

updateHistory.reason: To make the map more intuitive.
